translated: One will be worshipped by all the gods of the underworld, the earth, and the heavens, who will shake the three worlds.

original: rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang ni @105b gsang ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par gyis te /
analyzed: rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang ni @105b gsang ba'i spyod pa'i khyad par gyis te /
translated: Even by the mere recollection of the special secret conduct,

original: dbang po rab 'bring rnams la ste bskyed pa'i rim par lha la gnang ba thob cing /
analyzed: dbang po rab 'bring rnams la ste bskyed pa'i rim par lha la gnang ba thob cing /
translated: one will obtain permission from the deity in the creation stage,

original: rdzogs par rtags 'ga' thon pas so //
analyzed: rdzogs par rtags 'ga' thon pas so //
translated: and some signs of perfection will emerge.

original: las chen thams cad dang grub pa brgyad la sogs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi don dngos grub rnams rim bzhin ster bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: las chen thams cad dang grub pa brgyad la sogs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi don dngos grub rnams rim bzhin ster bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: The attainments of the true wisdom of all great actions and the eight accomplishments and so forth will be granted in stages.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i mchog 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i mchog 'grub pa'o //
translated: The supreme accomplishment of the great seal will be achieved.

original: lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i las gsang sngags go bzlog tu bstan pa ni h'a sv'a nas aom gyi bar du bstan pa snying po gsang ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i las gsang sngags go bzlog tu bstan pa ni h'a sv'a nas aom gyi bar du bstan pa snying po gsang ba bstan pa'o //
translated: The secret of the essence is taught as the reversal of the mantra from hāṃ to oṃ, which is taught as the action of one endowed with deity yoga.

original: nus pa'i khyad par ni /
analyzed: nus pa'i khyad par ni /
translated: The special ability is as follows.

original: sngags 'di bklags pas 'grub pa ste zhes rdo rje ltar thogs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sngags 'di bklags pas 'grub pa ste zhes rdo rje ltar thogs pa med pa'o //
translated: This is accomplished by reciting this mantra, which is like a vajra, without obstruction.

original: las rnams kun byed dge ba yin //
analyzed: las rnams kun byed dge ba yin //
translated: It is virtuous, which is all activities.

original: zhes thog mtha' bar du mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes thog mtha' bar du mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: This is unchanging in the beginning, middle, and end.

original: 'di'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: 'di'i 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni /
translated: The application of this wheel is as follows:

original: dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa las bzhi dang bcas pa'i dur khrod la rdo rje ra ba dang / me 'od phreng bas bskor ba bya /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa las bzhi dang bcas pa'i dur khrod la rdo rje ra ba dang / me 'od phreng bas bskor ba bya /
translated: On cloth from a charnel ground, draw a wheel with four maṇḍalas and a charnel ground, surrounded by a vajra fence and a garland of blazing fire.

original: lte ba la padma 'dab ma bcu pa la sngags dgod pa ste //
analyzed: lte ba la padma 'dab ma bcu pa la sngags dgod pa ste //
translated: In the center, on a ten-petaled lotus, arrange the mantra.

original: dbus su aom bam h'um /
analyzed: dbus su aom bam h'um /
translated: In the center, oṃ vaṃ hūṃ.

original: shar nas g-yon bskor du 'dab ma re la yig 'bru gnyis gnyis dgod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: shar nas g-yon bskor du 'dab ma re la yig 'bru gnyis gnyis dgod par bya ba ste /
translated: In the east, clockwise, on each petal, arrange two syllables.

original: dbus su phrin las gang bsgrub pa'i ming spel bskul tshig dang bcas pa dgod par bya //
analyzed: dbus su phrin las gang bsgrub pa'i ming spel bskul tshig dang bcas pa dgod par bya //
translated: In the center, arrange the name of the person for whom the activity is being performed, together with the words of the invocation.

original: de la lha mo rnams kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshigs pa bskyed /
analyzed: de la lha mo rnams kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshigs pa bskyed /
translated: There, generate the pledge wheel of the goddesses.

original: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas bstim /
analyzed: ye shes pa spyan drangs nas bstim /
translated: Invite the awareness beings and absorb them.

original: dbang bskur rgyas gdab /
analyzed: dbang bskur rgyas gdab /
translated: Confer empowerment and seal with the syllables.

original: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du yig 'bru lha mo thams cad bstim pas 'od 'bar bar blta'o //
analyzed: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du yig 'bru lha mo thams cad bstim pas 'od 'bar bar blta'o //
translated: One should see the blazing light by dissolving all the syllable goddesses into the offering, praise, and tasting of the elixir.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i phrin las 'dir bsdu bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i phrin las 'dir bsdu bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the activity of Vajrayoginī and her retinue here,

original: mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang ni rigs bdun gyis bsdus pa de dag go //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang ni rigs bdun gyis bsdus pa de dag go //
translated: it is said, the dakinis, yoginis, and the seven families.

original: dum skyes l'a ma la sogs pa ni snying po'i bde chen gyi ta ki dag go //
analyzed: dum skyes l'a ma la sogs pa ni snying po'i bde chen gyi ta ki dag go //
translated: The dakinis such as Lāmā and Khaṇḍarohā are the dakinis of the great bliss of the essence.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi //
translated: It is said, of all the dakinis,

original: zhes rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad bsdus pa'i sa bon gyi sngags nyi 'di snyid yin par grags pa bla na med pa nges par myur du grub byed kyi snying po nyid do //
analyzed: zhes rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad bsdus pa'i sa bon gyi sngags nyi 'di snyid yin par grags pa bla na med pa nges par myur du grub byed kyi snying po nyid do //
translated: and this is known as the essence mantra that includes all thirty-two yoginis. It is the essence that definitely and swiftly accomplishes the unsurpassed.

original: sa 'og gi sku'i d'a ki rnams kyi klu la sogs pas phrin las bsgrub pa /
analyzed: sa 'og gi sku'i d'a ki rnams kyi klu la sogs pas phrin las bsgrub pa /
translated: The activity of the earth dakinis is accomplished by nagas and so forth.

original: yang na mtho ris sam ni mkha' spyod thugs kyi d'a ki rnams kyi lha'i pho nyas so //
analyzed: yang na mtho ris sam ni mkha' spyod thugs kyi d'a ki rnams kyi lha'i pho nyas so //
translated: Or, the activity of the celestial or space-traveling mind dakinis is accomplished by divine messengers.

original: de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang //
analyzed: de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang //
translated: Likewise, in the human world,

original: zhes sa spyod gsung gi d'a ki rnams kyi gnod @106a * //
analyzed: zhes sa spyod gsung gi d'a ki rnams kyi gnod @106a * //
translated: the messengers of the earth-dwelling dakinis

original: sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa bran du bkol pa'i pho nyas phrin las sna tshogs byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa bran du bkol pa'i pho nyas phrin las sna tshogs byed pa'o //
translated: employ the yakshas, rakshasas, and so forth as servants to perform various activities.

original: las ni gang dag yod pa rnams zhes pa las chen bcu gnyis dang / bsdus pa phrin las bzhi pa la sogs pa grub par byed pa'o /
analyzed: las ni gang dag yod pa rnams zhes pa las chen bcu gnyis dang / bsdus pa phrin las bzhi pa la sogs pa grub par byed pa'o /
translated: The activities are the twelve great deeds and the four activities of the condensed [form of the deity] and so forth, which are accomplished.

original: sngags kyis de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: sngags kyis de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: All of those are accomplished through mantra.

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i 'khor lo bstan pa ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i 'khor lo bstan pa ste /
translated: This is the teaching of the secret wheel mandala of glorious Vajrayogini.

original: de yang snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi go cha'i lha mo drug / mtshams ma brgyad de rnal 'byor ma bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa dur khrod kyis yongs su bskor ba ste /
analyzed: de yang snying po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi go cha'i lha mo drug / mtshams ma brgyad de rnal 'byor ma bcu dgu'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa dur khrod kyis yongs su bskor ba ste /
translated: Furthermore, the mandala of the nineteen yoginis-the four essence yoginis, the six armor yoginis, and the eight border yoginis-has four gates with archways and is completely surrounded by charnel grounds.

original: de'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mnyam rjes lam du bya ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mnyam rjes lam du bya ba bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching on the complete ritual and the path of meditation and post-meditation.

original: 'di las shin tu mchog tu gyur gang ni //
analyzed: 'di las shin tu mchog tu gyur gang ni //
translated: What is superior to this?🔽The knowledge of the uncontaminated wisdom

original: ye shes zag pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang // bde ba chen po mi 'gyur ba'i gsang ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zag pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang // bde ba chen po mi 'gyur ba'i gsang ba bstan pa'o //
translated: and the secret of unchanging great bliss are revealed.

original: 'jig rten gsum ni phyi'i lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i nus pa yang 'dir 'dus la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ni phyi'i lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i nus pa yang 'dir 'dus la /
translated: The three worlds are the power of outer gods, nāgas, yakṣas, and so on, which are included here.

original: nang gi ni dug gsum dag pa'i nyams snang nyid las phyi rol na ci yang med par sgro 'dogs chod pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi ni dug gsum dag pa'i nyams snang nyid las phyi rol na ci yang med par sgro 'dogs chod pa'o //
translated: The inner [worlds] are the appearances of experience purified of the three poisons. Since there is nothing at all external, reification is eliminated.🔽Since this is the accomplishment of the siddhi of the supreme, great secret bliss, it is said to be unsurpassed.

original: gsang chen bde ba mchog gi dngos grub grub pa gang phyir 'di ni bla na med de zhes thabs shes rab tha mi dad pa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: gsang chen bde ba mchog gi dngos grub grub pa gang phyir 'di ni bla na med de zhes thabs shes rab tha mi dad pa'i snying po'o //
translated: It is the essence of the indivisibility of method and wisdom.

original: las rnams ma lus grub byed yin //
analyzed: las rnams ma lus grub byed yin //
translated: It is the accomplishment of all activities.

original: zhes las dang dngos grub 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dpang phyug phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes las dang dngos grub 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i dpang phyug phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
translated: It is taught that activities and siddhis arise from the perfection of the wealth of the elements and the elemental evolutes.

original: da ni rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba bka'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba rigs bsdus pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: da ni rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba bka'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba rigs bsdus pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Now, in order to explain the secret maṇḍala of the cakravartans of the six families, the compendium of the families,

original: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ni rigs kyi bdag po ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ni rigs kyi bdag po ste /
translated: The glorious Vajrayoginī is the lord of the family.

original: rigs lnga po kun gyi 'byung gnas dpal rdo rje 'chang bde mchog 'khor lo'i rten dang brten pa'i 'khor lo las /
analyzed: rigs lnga po kun gyi 'byung gnas dpal rdo rje 'chang bde mchog 'khor lo'i rten dang brten pa'i 'khor lo las /
translated: The source of all five families is the glorious Vajradhara, the support and supported maṇḍala of Cakrasaṃvara.

original: mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no //
analyzed: mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no //
translated: It is explained concisely, not extensively.

original: don yongs su bsdus par bstan la tshig rgya cher ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: don yongs su bsdus par bstan la tshig rgya cher ma bstan pa'o //
translated: The meaning is taught concisely, not the words extensively.

original: 'dir mngon par rtogs pa ltar na /
analyzed: 'dir mngon par rtogs pa ltar na /
translated: Here, according to the abhisamaya,

original: dang por rang nyid skad cig gis nyi ma la gnas pa'i he ru ka zhal gcig gis nyi ma la gnas par bltas la /
analyzed: dang por rang nyid skad cig gis nyi ma la gnas pa'i he ru ka zhal gcig gis nyi ma la gnas par bltas la /
translated: first, oneself instantly becomes Heruka standing on the sun, with one face and two arms, looking at the sun.

original: sems bskyed sngon du 'gro bas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas la /
analyzed: sems bskyed sngon du 'gro bas gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas la /
translated: After generating bodhicitta, one should protect the place, oneself, and the yoga.

original: tshogs gnyis sogs par bya ba dang / stong pa'i dang las 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs kyi steng du /🔽@106b bh'um las byung ba'i ri bo bzang po ni /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis sogs par bya ba dang / stong pa'i dang las 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs kyi steng du / @106b bh'um las byung ba'i ri bo bzang po ni /
translated: After gathering the two accumulations, and so on, upon the stacked-up four elements arising from the totally empty hūṃ,🔽the excellent mountain arising from bhrūṃ

original: lhun po ri bo mchog rab ste /
analyzed: lhun po ri bo mchog rab ste /
translated: is Mount Meru, the best of mountains.

original: bri bar bya zhing ni yid kyi yul du blos bsam pa'o //
analyzed: bri bar bya zhing ni yid kyi yul du blos bsam pa'o //
translated: One should draw means one should imagine mentally.

original: me tog ni ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma sum cu so gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: me tog ni ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma sum cu so gnyis pa'o //
translated: One should draw, that is, mentally visualize, the flower, which is a thirty-two-petaled multicolored lotus on top of Mount Meru.

original: 'bras bu ni lte ba la ge sar dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis ni rdo rje rgya gram kha dog bzhi ldan no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni lte ba la ge sar dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis ni rdo rje rgya gram kha dog bzhi ldan no //
translated: The fruit is the multicolored vajra cross with stamens in the center, which has four colors.

original: yang bzang po bri bya zhing ni dkyil 'khor pho brang grub bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang bsam pa'o //
analyzed: yang bzang po bri bya zhing ni dkyil 'khor pho brang grub bzhi rta babs dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang bsam pa'o //
translated: One should also draw the excellent mandala palace with four corners and four doors, visualizing the celestial mansion that is the complete perfection of all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: de'i steng du rtag tu bsgom pa ni brten pa lha'i 'khor lo bstan pa la /
analyzed: de'i steng du rtag tu bsgom pa ni brten pa lha'i 'khor lo bstan pa la /
translated: Above that, one should always meditate on the wheel of the resident deities.

original: dpa' bo rnams ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi po thams cad do //
analyzed: dpa' bo rnams ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi po thams cad do //
translated: The heroes are all twenty-four.

original: de dag gi dpa' bo chen po nyid ni rgyal ba rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang dang / drug pa'i bdag nyid las /
analyzed: de dag gi dpa' bo chen po nyid ni rgyal ba rigs lnga rdo rje 'chang dang / drug pa'i bdag nyid las /
translated: Their greatness is from the five families of victors and Vajradhara, the sixth.

original: rdo rje'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba'i 'khor lo pho brang chen por rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med pa'i gzugs can ma dang don yod rgyal po dang sbyor ba'i l'a ma dang /🔽'od dpag med dang / sbyor ba'i dum skyes ma dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / gnyis su med pa'i rin chen rigs kyi l'a ma dang / dbus su dpal he ru ka dang gnyis su med pa'i dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ste chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: rdo rje'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba'i 'khor lo pho brang chen por rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang gnyis su med pa'i gzugs can ma dang don yod rgyal po dang sbyor ba'i l'a ma dang / 'od dpag med dang / sbyor ba'i dum skyes ma dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / gnyis su med pa'i rin chen rigs kyi l'a ma dang / dbus su dpal he ru ka dang gnyis su med pa'i dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ste chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin can no //
translated: In the great palace of the wheel, surrounded by a vajra fence, are dakinis nondual with Vajra Akṣobhya, Rūpiṇī nondual with Vairocana, Lāmā who is united with Amogharaaja, Khaṇḍarohā who is united with Amitābha, and Ratnajā who is nondual with Ratnasaṃbhava.🔽In the center is Śrī Vajrayoginī, nondual with Śrī Heruka, the nature of the emptiness of the dharmadhātu.

original: ha ha he he zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ha ha he he zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ Ha ha he he” is the sound of the laughter of the eight goddesses.

original: rin po che ke ke ru dang / margat ljang ba dang / bee d'u rya dang / padma r'a ga'i bum pa'i shing lo'i kha rgyan steng na thod pa bzhi dang bcas pa bdud rtsis gang ba la rab tu bzhad cing dgyes par rol pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che ke ke ru dang / margat ljang ba dang / bee d'u rya dang / padma r'a ga'i bum pa'i shing lo'i kha rgyan steng na thod pa bzhi dang bcas pa bdud rtsis gang ba la rab tu bzhad cing dgyes par rol pa'o //
translated: The vases are filled with nectar and have four skulls and are adorned with leaves of precious substances: sapphire, emerald, beryl, and ruby.

original: rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor du bkod pa ni /
analyzed: rigs drug 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'khor du bkod pa ni /
translated: The retinue of the universal monarch of the six families is arranged as follows.

original: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes rigs re re la dpa' bo yab yum can bzhi bzhis yongs su bskor ba ste /
analyzed: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi zhes rigs re re la dpa' bo yab yum can bzhi bzhis yongs su bskor ba ste /
translated: The twenty-four heroes are each surrounded by four heroes and heroines, one for each family.

original: so so'i 'khor lo la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje rgya gram dang padma dang rin po ches yongs su bskor ba'o //
analyzed: so so'i 'khor lo la rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje rgya gram dang padma dang rin po ches yongs su bskor ba'o //
translated: Each of the retinues is surrounded by vajras, wheels, vajra cross-swords, lotuses, and jewels.

original: gtso bo la rdo rje gri gug gi phreng bas bskor ba mtshams su bum pa bdud rtsi can ka p'a la dang bcas pa nyid do //
analyzed: gtso bo la rdo rje gri gug gi phreng bas bskor ba mtshams su bum pa bdud rtsi can ka p'a la dang bcas pa nyid do //
translated: The principal figures are surrounded by garlands of vajra flaying knives, and in the intermediate directions are vases filled with nectar and skull cups.

original: der ni dpa' bo rnams ni khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: der ni dpa' bo rnams ni khanda ka p'a la la sogs pa ste /
translated: The heroes there are Khaṇḍakapāla and so forth.

original: rgyan cha lugs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan cha lugs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: They are endowed with ornaments and costumes.

original: mkha' 'gro nyid ni mtshams ma brgyad dam tshig 'khor lo bkod pa'o //🔽dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams kyis 'gro @107a * //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro nyid ni mtshams ma brgyad dam tshig 'khor lo bkod pa'o // dpa' bo dpa' mo rnams kyis 'gro @107a * //
translated: The dakinis are the eight charnel grounds, or the array of the commitment wheel.

original: ba 'di dag thams cad khyab //
analyzed: ba 'di dag thams cad khyab //
translated: The heroes and heroines pervade all these migrating beings.

original: ces pa gsum kun du ye shes kyi rol pas phyi nang de kho na nyid du rol pas so //
analyzed: ces pa gsum kun du ye shes kyi rol pas phyi nang de kho na nyid du rol pas so //
translated: All three are the display of gnosis, the display of outer and inner reality.

original: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
translated: The dakini is the supreme bliss of the net.

original: zhes pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba'i de nyid kyi 'gro ba gzhan don dang 'brel pa nyid ston pa'o //🔽de las dkyil 'khor gyi dpa' bo rnams ni badzra tva la sogs nas /
analyzed: zhes pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba'i de nyid kyi 'gro ba gzhan don dang 'brel pa nyid ston pa'o // de las dkyil 'khor gyi dpa' bo rnams ni badzra tva la sogs nas /
translated: This shows that the one who possesses great compassion is connected with the welfare of other migrating beings.

original: khanda ka p'a la'i bar du ste /
analyzed: khanda ka p'a la'i bar du ste /
translated: From that, the heroes of the mandala are from Vajra Tattva and so on up to Khandakapala.🔽The body, speech, mind, qualities, and activities are subsumed in the indivisible bliss and emptiness.

original: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las bde stong dbyer med du bsdus pa nyid 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par gdod ma nas grub pa'i dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis zhes lha drag po 'jigs byed au mar bcas pa 'dul ba

original: mdun gyi gzugs brnyan la bstim par bya ba 'dis ni myur du grub par byed pa dpal dz'a landhar'i bzhed pa'o //
analyzed: mdun gyi gzugs brnyan la bstim par bya ba 'dis ni myur du grub par byed pa dpal dz'a landhar'i bzhed pa'o //
translated: This is the assertion of the glorious Jālandhara, who causes swift attainment by dissolving into the reflected image in front.

original: yang rang lhar gnas pa'i sa bon las 'od spros nas rlung rtsol drag tu byas te /🔽'od kha dog lnga spros pas /
analyzed: yang rang lhar gnas pa'i sa bon las 'od spros nas rlung rtsol drag tu byas te / 'od kha dog lnga spros pas /
translated: Again, light is emanated from the seed in the place of the deity in oneself, and one strongly applies the vāyu.

original: de'i sgo lnga'i rnam shes la bstim nas tshur drang zhing /🔽yang rang gi sna sgo g-yas kyi rlung phyir spro ba dang bstun te /
analyzed: de'i sgo lnga'i rnam shes la bstim nas tshur drang zhing / yang rang gi sna sgo g-yas kyi rlung phyir spro ba dang bstun te /
translated: Light of five colors is emanated and dissolves into the five sense consciousnesses of the person in front.🔽Again, in coordination with exhaling the vāyu through the right nostril, light is emanated and enters through the left nostril of the person in front.

original: 'od zer spros pas de'i sna sgo g-yon nas zhugs pas de'i lus kyi nus pa thams cad bsdus te /
analyzed: 'od zer spros pas de'i sna sgo g-yon nas zhugs pas de'i lus kyi nus pa thams cad bsdus te /
translated: All the potency of the body of the person in front is gathered and,

original: srog 'phrog pa'i thig le tshur byung bas mdun gyi gzugs brnyan de dag gi sna sgo g-yon nas zhugs shing thim par blta /
analyzed: srog 'phrog pa'i thig le tshur byung bas mdun gyi gzugs brnyan de dag gi sna sgo g-yon nas zhugs shing thim par blta /
translated: in coordination with inhaling, the bindu of the life-force of the person in front is drawn up and dissolves into the left nostril of the reflected image in front.

original: de ltar yang dang yang du byas pas dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur bas myur du grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar yang dang yang du byas pas dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur bas myur du grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Since the visualization becomes clear by doing that again and again, one will attain swift accomplishment.

original: mkhas pas shing lo zhes pa la sogs pa rang lus ljon shing gi rnam par bsgyur ba le'u bcu gnyis pa'i las so //
analyzed: mkhas pas shing lo zhes pa la sogs pa rang lus ljon shing gi rnam par bsgyur ba le'u bcu gnyis pa'i las so //
translated: The wise one, with the leaves, and so on, transforms his own body into the form of a tree, the activity of the twelfth chapter.

original: yang phyugs nyid kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pas @109a * //
analyzed: yang phyugs nyid kyis ni zhes pa la sogs pas @109a * //
translated: Again, with the cattle, and so on,

original: le'u zhe bdun pa'i don gyi rnam par bsgyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: le'u zhe bdun pa'i don gyi rnam par bsgyur ba nyid do //
translated: the meaning of the forty-seventh chapter is transformed into the very nature of the tree.

original: mi rnams zhes pa nas 'gog byed yin gyis log rtog dgag pa bstan /
analyzed: mi rnams zhes pa nas 'gog byed yin gyis log rtog dgag pa bstan /
translated: The humans, and so on, are the refutation of the refutation of the false imagination.

original: glang po rta dang nas khrung ba'i bar gyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas srid pa dag pa'i ye shes kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal dag pas /
analyzed: glang po rta dang nas khrung ba'i bar gyis rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas srid pa dag pa'i ye shes kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang las dang sdug bsngal dag pas /
translated: The elephant, horse, and so on, up to the crane, are the yogi/nī who purifies the twelve links of dependent origination, the body of pristine consciousness that purifies existence, purified of afflictions, karma, and suffering.

original: dus sbyor dang nyi khyim rnam par dag pas /
analyzed: dus sbyor dang nyi khyim rnam par dag pas /
translated: The lunar mansions and the zodiac are purified.

original: las kyi rlung dag pas /
analyzed: las kyi rlung dag pas /
translated: The karmic vāyu is purified.

original: sa ra sa nam mkha' lding sa'i dbang phyug thob pas /
analyzed: sa ra sa nam mkha' lding sa'i dbang phyug thob pas /
translated: The garuḍa of the sarasvata obtains the lord of the earth.🔽All good and bad are purified into the form of the deity.

original: bzang ngan thams cad dag pa lha'i gzugs su de 'gyur ro zhes las kyi lus rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i sku bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bzang ngan thams cad dag pa lha'i gzugs su de 'gyur ro zhes las kyi lus rnam par dag pa rdo rje'i sku bstan pa'o //
translated: The body of karma is the vajrakāya.

original: 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin gyi bar gyis ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin gyi bar gyis ni /
translated: The greatness of rising from clear light into the body of union is shown by the phrase “not existing in the three worlds.”

original: 'od gsal las zung 'jug gi skur ldang ba'i che ba ston pa skad cig ma'i ye shes rnam thar sgo gsum dag pa he ru kar gyur pas bde chen mi 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal las zung 'jug gi skur ldang ba'i che ba ston pa skad cig ma'i ye shes rnam thar sgo gsum dag pa he ru kar gyur pas bde chen mi 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par ston pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of the instant, the purity of the three doors of liberation, is shown to attain the state of unchanging great bliss.

original: le'u'i mtshan ni skye ba bdun pa bsgrub par bya ba ste zhe dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u'i mtshan ni skye ba bdun pa bsgrub par bya ba ste zhe dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The name of the chapter is the explanation of the forty-ninth chapter on accomplishing the seven-born.

original: // / dpal ldan nyi ma'i snying pos rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo don kun byed ma nyid kyis phrin las spyod //
analyzed: // / dpal ldan nyi ma'i snying pos rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo don kun byed ma nyid kyis phrin las spyod //
translated: The glorious sun-essence Vajrayoginī’s wheel accomplishes all purposes.

original: gang du gnang la 'bebs pa'i sbyin sreg gsang ba las kyang rab dbye mchog tu bstan pa sngom pa bsdus pa nyid /
analyzed: gang du gnang la 'bebs pa'i sbyin sreg gsang ba las kyang rab dbye mchog tu bstan pa sngom pa bsdus pa nyid /
translated: The secret fire offering that bestows the descent of the wisdom being is also taught as the supreme division of the supreme secret.

original: ces pa'i don to //
analyzed: ces pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: de la 'dir gong du gsungs pa'i bsam gtan dang gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa bstan par bya ba las rab 'byams kyi phrin las kyi gzhung nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /🔽de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni //
analyzed: de la 'dir gong du gsungs pa'i bsam gtan dang gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa bstan par bya ba las rab 'byams kyi phrin las kyi gzhung nye bar bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir / de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni //
translated: In this context, in order to teach the system of the infinite activities that are to be accomplished through the previously explained meditative concentration and mantra,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, the rite of homa . . .”

original: 'di nyid don mdor bstan pa'i gsang ba ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid don mdor bstan pa'i gsang ba ste /
translated: This is the secret concise explanation of the meaning of this [tantra].

original: phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi bye brag gis thun mong pa dang khyad par ba'i lha mchod pas /
analyzed: phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi bye brag gis thun mong pa dang khyad par ba'i lha mchod pas /
translated: By means of the common and special worship of the deities, which are distinguished by the outer and inner realities,

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: one will accomplish the mundane and supramundane feats.

original: nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba ni yul gang la dmigs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba ni yul gang la dmigs pa thams cad do //
translated: “All that is to be brought under one’s power” refers to the object of observation.

original: yang dag cho ga ni spyir dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi bye brag las /
analyzed: yang dag cho ga ni spyir dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus kyi bye brag las /
translated: “The perfect rite” is, in general, the worship of the deities of the glorious Cakrasaṃvara maṇḍala, which is distinguished by the extensive and concise maṇḍalas.

original: 'dir ni dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i phrin las gang gis ni gsang chen gyi che ba dka' ba med par /
analyzed: 'dir ni dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i phrin las gang gis ni gsang chen gyi che ba dka' ba med par /
translated: Here, it is the activity of the clear realization of glorious Vajrayoginī, by which the greatness of the Great Secret is attained without difficulty.

original: myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad //
analyzed: myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur bshad //
translated: It is said that one will quickly attain power.

original: ces sngon byung dang rjes 'jug la dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: ces sngon byung dang rjes 'jug la dgongs pa'o //
translated: This is stated with regard to the former and latter [lineages].

original: da ni rgyas par bshad pa la /
analyzed: da ni rgyas par bshad pa la /
translated: Now, the extensive explanation.

original: dang por lha'i rnal 'byor ni gnas dpen par /
analyzed: dang por lha'i rnal 'byor ni gnas dpen par /
translated: First, the yoga of the deity is in an isolated place.

original: nub mo chos kyi sku'i 'od gsal @109b gyi dang du nyal ba las /
analyzed: nub mo chos kyi sku'i 'od gsal @109b gyi dang du nyal ba las /
translated: At night, one goes to sleep in the luminosity of the dharmakāya.

original: rmi lam longs sku'i tshul dang sad pa sprul pa'i sku'i tshul las sems bskyed cing /
analyzed: rmi lam longs sku'i tshul dang sad pa sprul pa'i sku'i tshul las sems bskyed cing /
translated: One generates bodhicitta from the dream, which is the saṃbhogakāya, and from the waking state, which is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
analyzed: gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba byas nas /
translated: Having protected the place, oneself, and the yoga,

original: tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rjes la /
translated: after gathering the two accumulations,

original: 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs dang / gzhal yas khang gi lte bar /
analyzed: 'byung bzhi rim brtsegs dang / gzhal yas khang gi lte bar /
translated: one meditates on the stacked-up four elements and the celestial mansion.

original: padma la gnas pa'i a'a li k'a li las nyi zla padma'i dbus su sa bon bam dmar ba las rdo rje gri gug 'od 'bar ba las 'de 'phros pas gdod ma nas grub pa'i dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i lha tshogs kyi thugs rgyud bskul zhing mchod par gyur
analyzed: padma la gnas pa'i a'a li k'a li las nyi zla padma'i dbus su sa bon bam dmar ba las rdo rje gri gug 'od 'bar ba las 'de 'phros pas gdod ma nas grub pa'i dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i lha tshogs kyi thugs rgyud bskul zhing mchod par gyur
translated: That light strikes the mind streams of the glorious Cakrasaṃvara and retinue, who have existed from the beginning, and they are offered to.

original: / 'od de tshur 'dus pa las dpal rje btsun ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: / 'od de tshur 'dus pa las dpal rje btsun ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa /
translated: The light returns and becomes the glorious venerable lady with one face, three eyes, and two hands.

original: skra grol ba /🔽phyag g-yas na rdo rje gri gug bsnams pa /
analyzed: skra grol ba / phyag g-yas na rdo rje gri gug bsnams pa /
translated: Her hair is loose.🔽She holds a flaying knife in her right hand.

original: g-yon pa ka p'a la bdung rtsis bkang pa 'dzin pa /
analyzed: g-yon pa ka p'a la bdung rtsis bkang pa 'dzin pa /
translated: Her left hand holds a skull cup filled with blood to her heart.

original: gru khugs su kha tv'am g-yo pa /
analyzed: gru khugs su kha tv'am g-yo pa /
translated: She holds a khaṭvāṅga in her crook.

original: zhabs g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pas dus mtshan dang 'jigs byed mnan pa /🔽thod pa dbul bcings pa /🔽mgo bo rlon pa'i do shal can /
analyzed: zhabs g-yas brkyang zhing g-yon bskum pas dus mtshan dang 'jigs byed mnan pa / thod pa dbul bcings pa / mgo bo rlon pa'i do shal can /
translated: Her right leg is extended and her left leg is contracted, standing on Kālarātri and Bhairava.🔽She has five bone ornaments and a head ornament of five dried human heads.

original: rus pa'i rgyan cha lnga dang rin po ches brgyan pas /
analyzed: rus pa'i rgyan cha lnga dang rin po ches brgyan pas /
translated: She has a garland of fresh heads and is adorned with bone ornaments and jewels.

original: dar dbyangs kyis mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: dar dbyangs kyis mdzes pa'o //
translated: She is beautified by silk ribbons.

original: de'i phyogs bzhir d'a ki ma dang l'a ma sogs pa padma la gnas pa /
analyzed: de'i phyogs bzhir d'a ki ma dang l'a ma sogs pa padma la gnas pa /
translated: In the four directions of that are dakinis, lamas, and so forth, standing on lotuses.

analyzed: phyogs bral du rin po che'i bum pa'i steng na ka p'a la bdud rtsis bkang ba can no //
translated: In the intermediate directions are kapalas filled with nectar on top of jeweled vases.

original: de nas dam tshig 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa gsal bar bltas la /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa gsal bar bltas la /
translated: Then, having visualized the eight goddesses of the commitment wheel,

analyzed: gnas gsum byin gyis brlab cing go cha bgo pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa bstim pa dang dbang bskur zhing /
translated: one should perform the yoga of recitation, which is the consecration of the three places, the donning of the armor, the invocation of the gnosis mandala, the absorption of that, the conferral of initiation,

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab cing /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab cing /
translated: the sealing by glorious Vajrasattva,

original: phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi mchod bstod dang / lce par sa bon la sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nang de kho na nyid kyi mchod bstod dang / lce par sa bon la sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
translated: and the outer, inner, and ultimate offerings and praises, and the visualization of the mantra circle around the seed syllable on the tongue.

original: de nyid la /
analyzed: de nyid la /
translated: In that regard,

original: lha rnams thams cad bsgom ba ni //
analyzed: lha rnams thams cad bsgom ba ni //
translated: the meditation on all the deities

original: zhes dkyil 'khor 'khor lo las /
analyzed: zhes dkyil 'khor 'khor lo las /
translated: is from the mandala wheel.

analyzed: las thams cad pa'i thab khung du me lha'i thugs kar lha tshogs gsal bar blta ba'o //
translated: In the hearth of the all-activity fire, one should visualize the assembly of deities in the heart of the fire god.

analyzed: thun gnyis bar du ni mchod bstod dang ldan pas sbyin sreg bya ba ni tshe dang dbang thang 'phel ba'i do na du'o //
translated: In between the two sessions, one should perform the fire sacrifice together with the offerings and praises, for the sake of increasing life and power.

original: de'i phan yon ni /
analyzed: de'i phan yon ni /
translated: The benefit of that is:

analyzed: mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob gyur ni aa dha ri shi gha man zhes ye shes kyi sku 'thob pa'i don to //
translated: having attained the state of moving in space, one obtains the body of wisdom, which is the meaning of adharishighama.

original: rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis zhes rnal 'byor pa tham mal pa'i lus 'di nyid yongs su dag pa'i don @110a * //
analyzed: rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis zhes rnal 'byor pa tham mal pa'i lus 'di nyid yongs su dag pa'i don @110a * //
translated: One's own body is that very thing, which is the meaning of the complete purity of this ordinary body of the yogi.

original: to ; / de la dang por dbang gi thab khung la dbyibs zla gam par ro //
analyzed: to ; / de la dang por dbang gi thab khung la dbyibs zla gam par ro //
translated: First, the fire pit of the empowerment has the shape of a half-moon.

analyzed: go mam sa ni ba lang dmar ser gyi sha dang / myos byed bsre ba da du ra dang do //
translated: The cow is the flesh of a red-brown cow, and the intoxicant is mixed with asafoetida and cumin.

original: lag pa g-yon pa la ni de'i dus su lag pa'i mchod pa dang rjes su 'brel ba ste /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa la ni de'i dus su lag pa'i mchod pa dang rjes su 'brel ba ste /
translated: On the left hand, at that time, there is the hand worship connected with that.

analyzed: dgang gzar blugs gzar dang ldan pas sbyin sreg brgya tsa brgyad bya ba nyid do //
translated: One should perform the fire sacrifice with the ladle and the offering spoon, together with the pouring and sprinkling, one hundred and eight times.

original: me lha dmar ba'i snying gar lha yang dmar ba ste /
analyzed: me lha dmar ba'i snying gar lha yang dmar ba ste /
translated: The fire god is red in the heart of the red deity.

analyzed: zhag bdun la sogs par spel tshig dang ldan pas phrin las la sbyar bas sangs rgyas lta bu'am /
translated: If you apply this practice for seven days and so forth, you will be like a buddha.🔽

analyzed: brgya byin lta bu nus ldan yang dbang du gyur na /
translated: If one applies the rite with the expansion words for seven days and so on, one will even subjugate one who is powerful like a buddha or like Indra.

original: phran tshegs mi ni smos mi dgos //
analyzed: phran tshegs mi ni smos mi dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention minor humans?

original: des shin tu myur par grub par byed pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des shin tu myur par grub par byed pa bstan pa'o //
translated: This teaches the very swift accomplishment.

original: las kyi bya ba las /
analyzed: las kyi bya ba las /
translated: From among the activities,

analyzed: kha chu ni ba dmar ser gyi kha nas 'bab pa ste /

translated: One should anoint one’s body with that, which is like a fragrant paste, and with passion, the madana fruit, or

analyzed: yang na ma da na ming dang bcas pa ni 'di zhes bya ba a'a ksha ya me pa sha ma na ya hr'i:dza:ku ru nyo: zhes ming spel dang bcas pas /
translated: alternatively, one should repeat the name, “Such and such,” with the expansion words, “akṣaya-me-paśamana-ya hṛīḥ jaḥ kuru ṇyoḥ.”

original: khams gsum bdag ni dbang du 'gyur ba la d'a kyi phrin las la sbyar ba phyi nang du yang dag bar grub pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum bdag ni dbang du 'gyur ba la d'a kyi phrin las la sbyar ba phyi nang du yang dag bar grub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of the outer and inner is the application to the activity of the messenger, who is under one's control in the three realms.

original: da ni dgug pa'i las la sbyar ba ni /
analyzed: da ni dgug pa'i las la sbyar ba ni /
translated: Now, the application to the activity of summoning is:

analyzed: rang 'byung gi ni mtshal dang ni rigs ldan grub par bya ba /
translated: the self-originated vermilion, and the accomplishment of the one endowed with the family,

analyzed: rlon pa'i zas dang zos pa ni skye tshe yungs mar btsos ba skyug pa'o //
translated: the fresh food, and the vomit, which is the salt and mustard seed boiled in oil.

analyzed: mi'i bu mo gzhon nu ma'i skra dang ldan pa'i spyin sreg byas na /
translated: If one performs the burnt offering with the hair of a young human girl,

analyzed: ming spel dang ldan pas brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs pas mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin zhes thabs kyi che ba bstan ba'o //
translated: endowed with the repetition of the name, she will be summoned immediately by one hundred and eight, and so on. This is the teaching of the greatness of the method.

original: da ni drag po'i bye brag mdza' bo nang dbye bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: da ni drag po'i bye brag mdza' bo nang dbye bar bya ba ni /
translated: Now, the division of the friend, which is a particular of the fierce, is:

analyzed: 'og min dang / ri rab rtse dang / 'dzam bu'i gling du yang snang bar mdzad pa'o //
translated: He also appears in Akaniṣṭha, on the peak of Mount Meru, and in Jambudvīpa.

original: phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas pa ni kun du khyab cing lhun gyis grub pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas pa ni kun du khyab cing lhun gyis grub pa'o //
translated: He abides as the nature of the outer and inner, pervading and spontaneously present.

original: thogs pa med par kun gyi dbang phyug tu bstan pas gar gyi cho 'phrul ni dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che ni dus dang rnam pa thams cad du bdud las rgyal ba'i sku gtso bor 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thogs pa med par kun gyi dbang phyug tu bstan pas gar gyi cho 'phrul ni dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che ni dus dang rnam pa thams cad du bdud las rgyal ba'i sku gtso bor 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The dance of the magical display is taught to be the lord of all without obstruction. The glorious great king Heruka is the principal body that is victorious over the māras in all times and aspects.

original: 'dod pa kun ni sgrub pa pos don kun stsol ba nying las /
analyzed: 'dod pa kun ni sgrub pa pos don kun stsol ba nying las /

analyzed: dbang phyug gi gtso ni ye shes kyi dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pa nyid do //
translated: He is the lord of lords, since he is endowed with the eight lordships of gnosis.

original: kun du phyag dang ni zla ba bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: kun du phyag dang ni zla ba bcu gnyis rnam par dag pa /
translated: He has hands everywhere, since he is the purification of the twelve months.

analyzed: zhabs ldan zhing ni nyi ma lho byang du 'grod pa gnyis so //
translated: He has feet everywhere, since he is the two movements of the sun to the north and south.

original: kun du spyan dang ni dus gsum thams cad dus med mnyam par nyid du gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: kun du spyan dang ni dus gsum thams cad dus med mnyam par nyid du gzigs pa'o //
translated: He has eyes everywhere, since he sees all times of the three times as equal in the absence of time.

original: gtsug ror zhal te gtsug tor bltar ma mngon pa dang / zhal gyis khyab pa tshad med pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba /
analyzed: gtsug ror zhal te gtsug tor bltar ma mngon pa dang / zhal gyis khyab pa tshad med pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba /

original: kun du thos ldan ni gsung gi gsang ba bde chen bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bcu drug 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can la sogs par yang gsung thos pa nyid kyis so //🔽thams cad g-yogs te /
analyzed: kun du thos ldan ni gsung gi gsang ba bde chen bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bcu drug 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can la sogs par yang gsung thos pa nyid kyis so // thams cad g-yogs te /

original: rnam par bzhugs pa ni sku gsung thugs ye shes kyi gsang ba bde chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los 'khor 'das thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nyid do //

translated: The one who is situated everywhere is the secret of the exalted body, speech, mind, and exalted wisdom, since the inexhaustible wheel of ornaments performs the benefit of all samsara and nirvana with the inconceivable great bliss of the exalted body, speech, mind, and exalted wisdom.

original: da ni gzhung nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas lam grub pa'i don bstan pa ni de nas dngos grub bya ba ni 'bras bu'i mchog gsang ba mchog thun mong ngo //

analyzed: bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te ni lam gyi rim pas dam tshig sngom pa spyod pa dang ldan pa mthar 'byin pa'o //
translated: The mind endowed with meditative concentration is the one that is endowed with the practice of the vows of the stages of the path, and perfection is the ultimate.

original: sgrub pa pos rten gyi gang zag nyams len byed pa la phan pa'i phyir zhes pa ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la dgongs pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos rten gyi gang zag nyams len byed pa la phan pa'i phyir zhes pa ma 'ongs pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la dgongs pa nyid do //
translated: The practitioner's intention is for the benefit of the person who practices, and it is for those who have the fortune of the future.

original: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //
analyzed: ru ni bkod pa dang bral ba //

original: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Ka means not abiding anywhere.

translated: The meaning of this is that the three doors of liberation, the four moments of body, speech, and mind, and the manifest, complete enlightenment of the heart essence, the wisdom that is actually present, are the four moments.

original: mtshan thos pa tsam gyis @117a * //
analyzed: mtshan thos pa tsam gyis @117a * //
translated: Merely hearing the name

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu sbyangs pa can gyi spyod yul du gyur ba'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan ni thun bzhi la sogs par ro //
translated: Meditation is done in four sessions and so forth.

analyzed: 'di nyid yid la sems pa tsam gyis sam mos pa byas pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan du ma thob la /
translated: Merely thinking about this or having devotion to it brings about many good qualities.

analyzed: glegs bam du bklag cing kha don du 'don pa dang bris shing bcangs pas ni /
translated: Reading it in a book, reciting it, writing it out, and keeping it with you

analyzed: phan yon gyi khyad par mtho ris yan lag dang ldan pa'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 'gyur ba'am zhes gnas skabs pa la /
